alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Polk County through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Medulla to 6 miles west of Myakka City. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Lakeland Linder Airport, Medulla, Jan Phyl Village, Fort Meade, Lake Alfred, Crooked Lake Park, Mulberry, Dundee, Eagle Lake, Polk City, Lake Hamilton and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
